name: Army of Steel
description:
Resource-gathering, base-building RTS game, with a goal to create something new and innovative, and a focus on battle-arena style gameplay.

Gameplay

Build economy, construct buildings, train army, and crush your opponents.

Choose your moment, fortify your base, defend it, and give a deadly attack to enemies. Seize resources before your enemies, they will increase your army.

Do you have what it takes to outsmart your opponents ? Are you an expert in strategy ? If yes, then prove it on the battlefield !! ;)

Play singleplayer skirmish against AI, or multiplayer with friends on LAN.
